mc_NMBCDROPDOWN Struct Reference

#include <mCtrl/button.h>


Data Fields

NMHDR hdr
 Common notification structure header.
RECT rcButton
 Client reectangle of the dropdown button.

Detailed Description

Structure associated to MC_BCN_DROPDOWN notification. It is binary compatible with NMBCDROPDOWN. See Split buttons.
